English:
-----------
Category: Photography and Design 
Language: Multilingual 

Description: 
-------------------- 
CINEMA 4D Studio is the best that MAXON has to offer professional 3D artists. If you want to do advanced 3D graphics but needs support to ensure you create stunning graphics quickly and easily, then this is the ideal choice. 

Besides containing all the features of CINEMA 4D Prime, View and Broadcast, CINEMA 4D Studio adds advanced tools for character hair, a physics engine and render unlimited clients. The end result is that Cinema 4D Studio can tackle any project with ease. 

Tools CINEMA 4D Studio characters make it easy to create advanced rigs and animation characters. Add hair or lint on the characters is fast and easy with the powerful set of tools that allows you to make hair grow, uncombed, stylize and animate. The physics engine has been renovated in the R12 makes it easy to carry out more complex collisions and the interaction between objects, whether a few or thousands. Network rendering allows you to take advantage of all the computers on your network to help you render your animation more quickly. 

Despite being advanced 3D, the extra tools that are in Studio are still designed for easy use and intuitive. The generation of advanced 3D effects like hair is amazingly easy and fast with CINEMA 4D by much of the hard work for you. For example, hair can automatically twist and swing around your character when you move and make thousands of objects collide with them, just a matter of a few mouse clicks to configure. 

CINEMA 4D Studio lets you unleash your creativity and enjoy 3D without limits. 

File Sharing 

"The man is an island" and MAXON CINEMA 4D either. Because in the real world 3D artists do not work in isolation, CINEMA 4D includes support for a large number of standard file formats in the industry. 

Rendering for Composition 

CINEMA 4D render passes in any desired format (image sequences, QuickTime movies or AVI) and create project files that automatically has ended all sequences, along with the correct format. Depending on the application of composition used, additional data such as 3D cameras, 3D lights or references to objects will be exported too. 

Check the list below to see what applications are compatible. 
-------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------- ----

---------------------

-------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------

A note on the card: 
-------------------------------------------------- ------- 
In short, CINEMA 4D and BodyPaint 3D graphics card works with any competent OpenGL (which are usually included in the last 10 years). We do however recommend you use a dedicated 3D graphics card with ATI or nVidia chipset. Currently, most powerful graphics chips are also available in the mid-range notebooks. 

Always be sure to use the latest drivers. New drivers are generally faster and stable. 

The graphics cards listed below are tested to run in Enhanced OpenGL mode from the summer of 2010. Any newer model will probably also have all the necessary features. 

nVidia GeForce: 8xxx (M)-series, 9xxx (M)-series, 1xx (M)-series, 2xx (M)-series, 3xx (M)-series, 4xx (M)-series 
nVidia Quadro FX-series x70, x80-series, series x700, x800-series 
ATI (Mobility) Radeon: HD2xxx-series, HD3xxx-series, HD4xxx-series-series HD5xxx 
ATI FirePro: all series 
ATI FireGL: x700-series, x800-series
